channel.title: Make guests register after a certain number of views
channel.description: Since we have tons of guests that visit daily and not many members anymore, why not make the guests register after they have looked at 5-10 topics. This way they will register and hopefully become active and then yay, more members.

item.title: Make guests register after a certain number of views
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

As others have demonstrated, the idea isn’t highly considered viable here. I don’t think it would translate into activity. If anything it’d just be an inconvenience for the very small number of guests that aren’t web crawlers. I tend to be driven away from sites like that more than anything.

Solved.

Read full topic
item.source: Make guests register after a certain number of views

item.title: Make guests register after a certain number of views
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:34, topic:547695”][quote author=n10si t link=topic=666600.msg4468976#msg4468976 date=1421877840]
Isn’t that actually a good idea? Turning the focus from RuneScape cheating to cheating on a more popular game? Also, do people still play private servers anymore? I mess around with one and me and my friends play on it, but there’s no use in marketing because nobody plays anything that isn’t soulsplit
[/quote]
Lots of people do, actually…
I’ve seen servers that just started make over $500 in a week.[/quote]

Maybe my server is just bad

Read full topic

item.title: Make guests register after a certain number of views
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Elrick, post:3, topic:547695”][quote author=nolan2131 link=topic=666600.msg4456993#msg4456993 date=1415471220]
Pretty sure I’ve seen this topic before in the past, I agree with you. Certainly would bring in more members.
[/quote]
That or it would result in less people using the site. Not sure which is worse though, the lack of activity or the lack of traffic.[/quote]This sums up my thoughts. R-S does this and half of the time I don’t remember my password there as I don’t save passes.

item.source: Make guests register after a certain number of views

item.title: Make guests register after a certain number of views
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:27, topic:547695”][quote author=Lothy link=topic=666600.msg4464001#msg4464001 date=1419022013]

I say we create a scripting platform for da Regue of Regends

What would league of legends cheating involve though? The game is vastly different in both scope and dynamics. The pace is much faster and decision making much more important.
[/quote]

Item hacks, drop hacks, skillshot dodging, auto flashing, skillshot scripts that rarely miss, etc. There really is a huge market for it right now[/quote]worst case scenario
bind into dx and capture when anims are drawn to keep tabs on everyones cooldowns
and minimap last seen locations and predicted next etc

it actually seems fairly easy if we get a good method of getting in (ie injection is prolly a very high ban rate)

Read full topic

item.title: Make guests register after a certain number of views
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

This idea is lousy. There’s nothing worse than being compelled to register to use a website.
I tend to close the tab whenever a website tried to compel me to register. It’s very rare that I value a website that much.

Read full topic

item.title: Make guests register after a certain number of views

[quote=“Lil_Smok3r, post:17, topic:547695”][quote author=Ambokile link=topic=666600.msg4462545#msg4462545 date=1418257383]
Has anywhere ever seen a forum that requires this and contains better content than its competitors that don’t require it?
[/quote]
Wait, my brain is lost.[/quote]
Any forum that has this is worse than forums that don’t.

Svitkona:

What’s the point of adding a feature like this? Whenever there’s a forum with that activated I either just ignore and go find what I was looking for somewhere else or I register, get what I wanted and then never visit that forum again

Yeah pretty much…

item.title: Make guests register after a certain number of views
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Hyperon, post:11, topic:547695”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=666600.msg4457000#msg4457000 date=1415473310]
I hate that shit.
Rune-Server does it and it annoys me.
I go on rune-server all the time and just browse. Not even make a single word of a reply. And I’m sure plenty of others do to. I’m sure you can tell how well that idea worked for them.

All you’re going to do is inflate the lurker population.
[/quote]
You could just remove all cookies and carry on viewing, but Rune-Server removed this restriction recently anyway.[/quote]
I play mindless amounts of flash games.
They save locally in cookies.

Read full topic
